de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors

Class ScaledContinuousColorMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.AbstractColorMapper<Double>
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.ContinuousColorMapper
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.ScaledContinuousColorMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorMapper, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Grayscale, HeatMap, LinearGradient, RainbowColors

    public abstract class ScaledContinuousColorMapper
extends ContinuousColorMapper
    An abstract base class for implementations of ContinuousColorMapper that allow to apply a a scaling factor to the values passed to ContinuousColorMapper.get(double).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.ColorMapper
